attributes.review: I had downloaded this app to see what all the boomers see in this app and honestly it’s horrible I just wanted to support the big fat orange president but there’s too many boomers and this app is just ugh.dont get it it’s false advertising.they failed to tell you that you shouldn’t support the fat orange 💃🏻🍊🍊🍊and it’s just really disappointing
attributes.title: Horrible and terrible and Horrifying

attributes.review: This app is horrendous I downloded it thinking that it would be a fun game but turns out it wasnt (shouldve seen the first red flag there but chose to ignore it) I then preceeded to interact with the app and it even asked for my location. Confused i still accepted and thought nothing of it HOWEVER two days later i get a knock on my door and a bunch of men in black and even donald trump himself came in and forced me to vote for him in november. I however declined because iam not republican (or a stupid idiot) they then proceeded to get my baby daughter out of her crib and dropped her in the toilet and flushed her down while also stomping on my pet chihuahua on the way out.They left me with nothing to live for now and ruined my life. 0/10 do not reccommend this game at all.
attributes.title: tracked me down✨
